titleInfo.title: Contest in Elocution: High School Department, Christian Brothers College

mods.abstract: Memphis' Goodwyn Institute was the site of CBC's Elocution Contest on March 3, 1911. Competitors included: Harold M. Walsh, Lawrence J. Long, Leo J. Pettis, Harold J. LaCroix, T. Henry Mullins, William P. Walsh, Lucas C. Thiers, Vincent D. Botto, Joseph A. Shippey, James A. Griffin, Frank M. Hays, and Charles McCauley.
